thread.title: Australia's Crown profit falls 41.3 pct on Macau downturn
thread.title_full: Australia's Crown profit falls 41.3 pct on Macau downturn | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Australia's Crown profit falls 41.3 pct on Macau downturn
text:
SYDNEY Aug 13 Australian casino operator Crown Resorts Ltd reported a 41.3 percent fall in full-year net profit on Thursday, dragged down by a weak result from its Macau business following a Chinese crackdown on corruption.
Crown said net profit for the year ended June 30 was A$385.07 million ($284.10 million), compared with A$655.76 million a year ago. Profit from Crown's one-third stake in Macau-focused Melco Crown Entertainment slumped 44.6 percent.
Crown Chairman James Packer said he was stepping down to a director position on the board but would remain co-chairman of Melco Crown.
($1 = 1.3554 Australian dollars) (Reporting Jane Wardell; Editing by Stephen Coates)
